item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:46 Chances: Lyft’s estimated fair value is US$35.37 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity The market rally is broadening out beyond mega-cap technology stocks, companies that cover a broad swath of the economy are starting to see their stocks join the rally in equities LYFT is set to thrive in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures Risks: Lyft shares fell 5.
